Confirmed news:

Razor stopped working on the AC2 crack.
Skidrow is working on it (in scene is avalable this crack, however still has to get the st-H4 hash check to ubi server reroute correct, this means that encryption is not fully working later on)
Reloaded is is creating an entire RIP database for AC2, but they said it will take time(possibly a month).

These are the latest news on the scene crack of AC2. It is possible that Skidrow will overcome the st-H4 problem in a day or two (as they said yesterday) so it can be that it can be here today or tomorrow. Reloaded will make a fully working cracked version but it will take more since it is a FULL rip.

This is the first day that we have been working on Assassin's Creed 2 and in this time we have achieved alot. We have bypassed the Ubisoft Launcher and you won't have to keep entering the cd key again and again. Even if you disconnect from the internet, the game will continue. And about the savegames; The Ubisoft server has only started working on March 5th. Only then we have been able to find out where the trigger files go to, their format and other vital information needed to make a working crack. A crack should be released the 5th, 6th or in the worst case scenario, the 7th of March.

Here's the most recent announcement of Razor1911:
Be patient, tonight or tomorrow crack should quit.

Protection already cracked, crack simply complete that was without bugs.

Too the people saying that it can't be cracked. Everything can be cracked. It's all about getting the missing pieces of the puzzle. Or in this case, creating some kind of offline server replicating the Ubisoft one containing the needed files. Then making the game think that this is the real Ubisoft server, thereby fooling the game ;)

Of course this is quite an extreme simplification of the work-around in mind seeing as there are most likely different complications that I/we don't know of seeing as we aren't crackers. But yeah, unless they have outright lied, it should work in theory. But seeing as Ubisoft are some proud SOB's regarding their brand-new DRM, they are most likely truthfull to quite an extent.

The game developers really shouldn't say anything at all when introducing new DRM's. It only serves to give the crackers a heads up, and challenging the Scene that apparently does this for the challenge and fun of it. Were it to become boring, they would most likely look for their fix in a different place...

This version of the game works PERFECTLY with the SKIDROW crack so there's NO excuse to not get the game to work.

1.) Download Skidrow's crack from here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5507231/Assassins_Creed_II-SKIDROW-CrackOnly

2.) Install the game 

3.) From the crack folder, Run the v1.01 update exe from UPDATE folder or let the game auto update by itself.

4.) Copy the content from the SKIDROW folder to these locations and overwrite. 32 bit is for both XP, Vista and Win7 editions. 64 bit for Vista and Win7 locations.                                                                                              

32 Bit:
C:Program Files\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher folder

64 Bit:                                                                       C:Program Files (x86)Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher folder                                                             

5.) Play the game
